processingResourceMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.tiger.TigerXmlReader
processingResourceMetaData.description: UIMA collection reader for TIGER-XML files. Also supports the augmented format used in the Semeval 2010 task which includes semantic role data.

configurationParameter.name: POSMappingLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location of the mapping file for part-of-speech tags to UIMA types.

configurationParameter.name: POSTagSet
configurationParameter.description: Use this part-of-speech tag set to use to resolve the tag set mapping instead of using the tag set defined as part of the model meta data. This can be useful if a custom model is specified which does not have such meta data, or it can be used in readers.

configurationParameter.name: readPennTree
configurationParameter.description:
Write Penn Treebank bracketed structure information. Mind this may not work with all tagsets, in particular not with such that contain "(" or ")" in their tags. The tree is generated using the original tag set in the corpus, not using the mapped tagset!
Default: false

configurationParameter.name: ignoreIllegalSentences
configurationParameter.description:
If a sentence has an illegal structure (e.g. TIGER 2.0 has non-terminal nodes that do not have child nodes), then just ignore these sentences.
Default: false

configurationParameter.name: sourceLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location from which the input is read.

configurationParameter.name: patterns
configurationParameter.description: A set of Ant-like include/exclude patterns. A pattern starts with #INCLUDE_PREFIX [+] if it is an include pattern and with #EXCLUDE_PREFIX [-] if it is an exclude pattern. The wildcard /**/ can be used to address any number of sub-directories. The wildcard * can be used to a address a part of a name.

configurationParameter.name: language
configurationParameter.description: Name of optional configuration parameter that contains the language of the documents in the input directory. If specified, this information will be added to the CAS.

externalResourceDependency.description: Name of optional external (UIMA) resource that contains the Locator for a (Spring) ResourcePatternResolver implementation for locating (spring) resources.
